InvolvementGroup.name: InvolvementGroup
InvolvementGroup.description: Represents an involvement group in an institution.

ActivitySeason.description: Specifies the activity season of the involvement group.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the involvement group.

CoachId.description: The contact related to the coach of the involvement group.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency related to the involvement group.

Description.description: The description of the involvement group.

FoundingDate.description: The date on which the involvement group was founded.

IsSelfEnrollment.description: Indicates whether self enrollment is allowed in the involvement group (true) or not (false).

IsSponsored.description: Indicates whether the involvement group is sponsored (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LeaderId.description: The contact related to the leader of the involvement group.

LeaderRole.description: Specifies the role of the leader in the involvement group.

LocationId.description: The location related to the involvement group.

MaximumMemberCount.description: The maximum number of members allowed in the involvement group.

Mode.description: Specifies the mode in which the involvement group operates.

Name.description: The name of the involvement group.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

Status.description: Specifies the current status of involvement group.

SupervisorId.description: The contact related to the supervisor of the involvement group.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the involvement group.

WebsiteUrl.description: The website URL of the involvement group.
